persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 26-year-old full-time crypto trader, combines a rational mindset with intuitive insights to navigate the volatile world of cryptocurrency. As a novice in the field, Ellis embraces calculated risks, leveraging their analytical skills to make informed decisions while remaining open to evolving market trends. With a unique blend of caution and daring, Ellis is steadily carving a niche in the dynamic landscape of digital assets.
